BIOL 210 Course Agenda

Week 1, Aug 27-29

agenda-week1.Rmd

Reminders

  • Please complete the Getting to Know You form by Sat Aug 30.

  • Remember to complete your grade contract by Wed Sep 3. Submit via the Assignment Turn-in link above.

  • BIOL 211 Lab will begin next week, Tue Sep 2 and Wed Sep 3. Lab meets in K119.

  • The first problem set is available and is due Sat Aug 30. You will also want to watch the week 1 content videos (see agenda week 1).

  • Quiz 1 will be due Fri Sep 5, at the same time as Quiz 2. Teams will work together on revisions in class on 9/5.

Content Videos

  • 01-Biodiversity

  • 02-Phylogenies

  • 03-Cells

Assignments

Problem Set 1 is due Sat Aug 30. It is beneficial for you to complete the content videos and begin assignments before the week of class.

Quiz 1 is due Fri Sep 5 at 9:00am (before class).

Class Meetings

Wednesday Aug 27

  • First day of class – go over syllabus, teaching philosophy, course expectations.

  • Link to slides Requires you to log into your Oberlin account to access.

  • GRADE CONTRACTS: Read this part of the syllabus carefully before filling out the Grade Contract Form with your due dates and other info. You are welcome to consult with Angie before submitting your contract. Contracts should be submitted by Wednesday Sept 3rd, end of day.

  • Please fill out the Getting to Know You form before Sat 8/30.

  • Note: I recommend you watch the videos for next week before Wed 9/3 (see Week 2 agenda).

Friday Aug 29

Begin case study “A Tale of Three Lice”.

Groups for first month

For the first month, these will be your assigned groups. You should sit in a cluster with these folks each day that class meets. Note: This year’s first team theme is carnivores of North America.

  • Foxes: Grant, Dylan, Cash, Toby
  • Bears: Milo, Bethany, Skylar, Shay
  • Badgers: Aurora, Cleo, Micah, Madeleine
  • Bobcats: Amy, Michael, Kylie, Arianna
  • Lynx: Solomon, Julia, Hailey, Matthew
  • Cougars: Ella, Ava, Gabriel, Danica
  • Wolves: Jeffrey, Lex, Koosh, Nina
  • Martens: Aimee, Oliver, Charlotte, Piers
  • Weasels: Natalie, Maddie, Chase, Bea
  • Coyotes: Devyn, Gabriela, Jarrod, Soomin
  • Otters: Griffin, Sophia, Mana, Liam
  • Wolverines: Amelia, Kristina, Riley, Iris
